description.displayText: We hired Simone for 'double duty' - caring for our active 9 year old and our pug Jackpot for a long deserved adult only weekend. We were impressed with both her professionalism and caring demeanor which allowed us to leave with peace of mind. Check ins were regular and we were thrilled with the reports. We will use Simone again, and again. Feeling selfish finishing this reference knowing her demand will increase!
